name: Fenix Box
description: This is a hardcore minimalist 2D platformer that tests how much of a hardcore gamer you are.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 9, 10. Processor: 1.0 GHz or faster for this bad boy. Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 11 MB available space Additional Notes: *This baby runs at 60 FPS!!!
